properties.displayName: MDE Alert - A process was injected with potentially malicious code
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "A process was injected with potentially malicious code"
| where MitreTechnique == "T1055;T1055.001;T1055.002;T1055.003;T1055.004;T1055.012;T1059.001"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - A process was injected with potentially malicious code - Mitre Techniques T1055,T1055.001,T1055.002,T1055.003,T1055.004,T1055.012,T1059.001
